message: We want to have clear and authentic sound in the video as we are taking videos in noise environment. In order to achieve it, we are using AKM4941 HD recording chip and 2 high sensitive mics. With multi-dimensional noise reduction and 3D recording , we can get perfect sound in our lives. #GioneeS8
Review our #MWC16 #Gionee #MakeSmiles. See you next year!

Focus speed is an feature we devote ourselves to improving.  Apart from PDAF technology, we are also using laser focus technology in #GioneeS8,  which works with PDAF to give you a faster speed. Double focus brings more accurate focus and can adapt to more scenarios.  #CaptureAwesomeness

#GioneeS8 is equipped with front fingerprint identifier, which it is more convenient to use and faster to recognize.With only 0.1 s response time and 0.38 s identification time, the screen can be unlocked immediately once you touch the fingerprint identifier.

#GioneeS8 is equipped with Mediatek helio P10 chip set, P10 is the latest chip set which brings better performance but lower power consumption. In addition, 4GB RAM lets you experience a faster speed. And 64 GB ROM, it means a bigger storage space.

The narrowest 5.5 inch phone in the world, big display but compact size. #GioneeS8 is using the latest and the best #AMOLED technology, it is the slimmest less than 0.7mm and the power consumption is 26% less compared with previous AMOLED technology. #geniusdesign.
#GioneeS8's 2.5D glass is different from other 2.5D. After colorful VM, it gives you colorful effect from any angel,  beautiful and premium. Details are matters. #CaptureAwesomeness

#GioneeS8 has adopted 16MP camera sensors and it is the first phone supports RWB technology. It is equipped with F1.8 aperture and 6P lens. With the new RWB technology, we can achieve  better performance for balancing the noise and brightness , especially in low light. #CaptureAwesomeness

What deserves a flagship mobile phone? Best display, powerful CPU, big memory, high pixel camera, fast fingerprint identifier, 4G+ connectivity, 3D touch and latest software ? It is very difficult to meet all the requirement, but #GioneeS8 is the phone which meets all the need.

#Gionee Smart technology - a life of smiles with the joy of sharing. We are able to share every moment of joy in our lives with all those smiling faces. Let's make Smiles to fulfill life with joy! #MakeSmiles #Gionee

For a smile, we empower ourselves with technology to create smart products. For a smile, we ensure superior quality by attending to every detail. For a smile, we offer seamless user experiences through constant improvement. Let's connect smiles and embrace love around us! #MakeSmiles

Let's Smile to chase the happiness of life! #MakeSmiles Mobile phone , as a tool to connect people around the world emotionally,we hope consumer can feel the joy and experience happiness when use #Gionee.

"#Gionee=Smile." People might not remember what we do, what we say, but we hope they will remember what we make them feel. We will devote ourselves to #MakeSmiles.  Starting from here and today. To make a better world. #MWC16

We've also launched #GioneeS8 in #MWC16  Barcelona. As William said in the launch event: with Gionee S8, everyone can be a film photographer! Capture awesomeness,let us record more precious memories.

Let's see what happened in #MWC16 Barcelona, #Gionee has launched its new identity. From a smart phone to a smile phone, we not only manufacture mobile phone, we want to create more smiles for the life!  #MakeSmiles

Have you monitored your kids' phone time? #GioneeS6 fixed it. With child mode,you can set what functions your children can access and when they can use them. Your children can only operate phone under it.

Big Screen or One Hand Operation? The answer is: Both! #GioneeS6 offers you better user experience! We devote ourselves to every creativity! #shinewithmetal

#Amilocker This function posts more than 10 pictures with both text and images every night at midnight, covering news, tourism, entertainment, sports, history and other contents. Enjoy it to your heart’s content. #GioneeS6 #shinewithmetal

The battery capacity of #GioneeS6 reaches 3150mAh and its capacity density also has reached 660Wh/L. These benefits can support the phone for 39.4 hours. And by using ACL technology, 25% more power can be saved. Therefore, it can significantly extend the using time for 53.1 hours.#shinewithmetal

With sufficient 3GB RAM, S6 can achieve multitask switching quickly and it also can deal with emergency situation easily. Besides, it owns 32GB ROM and there is also one T card slot to support up to 128G extension.S6 is also equipped with a 64 bit 8 cores CPU, which helps it achieve high performance and low power consumption. #shinewithmetal #GioneeS6

S6 is equipped with 13Mpxl rear camera, f2.0 large aperture. With PDAF( Phase Detection Auto-Focus), it can even realize 0.1s focus speed. When the screen is off, user can capture the amazing moment with 5 consecutive images by simply drawing “C”. Always faster than others.#shinewithmetal #GioneeS6

Curved surface design makes the back shell present a gradient of thickness from 6.9 mm to 4 mm. 45°bright diamond cutting lines, and with the exquisite sandblasting processing create extreme metallic texture and maintain the perfect hand feeling at the same time.#shinewithmetal #GioneeS6

We are in pursuit of perfection in metal，and our goal is to build a most shining fully-metal mobile phone. A single piece of aluminum alloy through CNC processing formed a one-piece shell. The metal proportion fills 89%.#shinewithmetal #GioneeS6
It’s time to pull away the veils. Shine with metal, S6 is coming….. #shinewithmetal #GioneeS6

Guess what “I” would look like? Tip 3: Symmetry exists everywhere, and it meets human’s aesthetic standards. We have designed many parts of the cell phone in a symmetrical way. The top and bottom edges and TYPE-C at the bottom are all centrally symmetric.

Guess what “I” would look like? Tip 2: Curved surface design, 45°bright diamond cutting lines,  with the addition of the exquisite sandblasting processing not only maintain the extreme metallic texture but also create the perfect hand feeling .

Guess what “I” would look like? Tip 1: As superlative perfection encounters noble temperament, this artwork was born. A single piece of aluminum alloy through CNC processing formed a one-piece shell. Shine with metal, shine with me!

So, most of you asked how about incoming one? In pursuit of perfection in metal, a most shining fully-metal phone is coming…… Shining Metallic Texture, is what you are waiting for? New Year, new you, new me! #Gionee
